about_the_game:
Welcome to this space adventure of a very distant planet called Cristya, a planet inhabited by children only, these children belong to the race of the Gisians a race too long-lived but in which children of this race can not live because of a deadly disease that kills the lives of infants, The only possible solution for children infected by this disease is to be sent to the planet Cristya to survive, besides the crystals of this planet are the perfect treatment for this disease, it is also a completely habitable planet for them, but not for adults because the opposite is the case, the atmosphere of Cristya is unhealthy for adult Gisians.

On this planet there is a government established by the adult Gisians who elected children who would be the king (Xavier) and the queen of Cristya (Mery) these little kings chose a group of children who would be the guardians of their planet and all the children of Cristya, 9 guardians of which there are two girls Lily and Sury, The task of these girls is to rescue their companions from the hands of the evil Wuning, an evil Gisian scientist who wants to steal the crystals to take over Cristya to build robots to replace the Gisian race to subsequently end the planet Gis being the sole and absolute ruler of both planets.

Wuning has created evil clones of Lily and Sury's companions, your mission is to rescue your companions and prevent Wuning from taking the crystals from the planet Cristya.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, rescue your teammates from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from ending the planet Cristya.
detailed_description:
Welcome to this space adventure of a very distant planet called Cristya, a planet inhabited by children only, these children belong to the race of the Gisians a race too long-lived but in which children of this race can not live because of a deadly disease that kills the lives of infants, The only possible solution for children infected by this disease is to be sent to the planet Cristya to survive, besides the crystals of this planet are the perfect treatment for this disease, it is also a completely habitable planet for them, but not for adults because the opposite is the case, the atmosphere of Cristya is unhealthy for adult Gisians.

On this planet there is a government established by the adult Gisians who elected children who would be the king (Xavier) and the queen of Cristya (Mery) these little kings chose a group of children who would be the guardians of their planet and all the children of Cristya, 9 guardians of which there are two girls Lily and Sury, The task of these girls is to rescue their companions from the hands of the evil Wuning, an evil Gisian scientist who wants to steal the crystals to take over Cristya to build robots to replace the Gisian race to subsequently end the planet Gis being the sole and absolute ruler of both planets.

Wuning has created evil clones of Lily and Sury's companions, your mission is to rescue your companions and prevent Wuning from taking the crystals from the planet Cristya.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, rescue your teammates from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from ending the planet Cristya.

short_description: Classic platform game, retro style. Help Lily or Sury to rescue your friends from the Evil Wuning, through 8 worlds and approximately 32 levels.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, French, Italian, Portuguese - Portugal
